about_the_game:
Mmo Game Maker is an engine focused on creating MMOs, which aims to streamline the development of multiplayer online games of various styles.

MMO game creation tool.

Mmo Game Maker is a game development tool that allows anyone to enjoy creating MMO with intuitive operation and advanced features with Lua 5.3 programming. It includes a map editor, code editor, and other tools to help you create your MMO game, as well as graphics and sound assets that you can make your game from the day you purchase it. Games created can be distributed royalty-free with or without compensation. Now, bring "your vision of the world" to life with Mmo Game Maker!

Write all functions using the power of the Lua 5.3 language

Create your own functions and mechanisms to shape your MMO games the way you have in mind. At lua, you can count on a vast library of features made exclusively to facilitate the creation of all kinds of events for your games. Furthermore, common MMO events such as "joining the party", "obtaining items" and "moving between maps" are pre-templated and can be used just by filling in the required fields such as character dialogue, available items, quests and destinations.

name: Mmo Game Maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Mmo Game Maker is an engine focused on creating MMOs, which aims to streamline the development of multiplayer online games of various styles.
